text: Pou is a virtual pet video game made for the BlackBerry 10, iOS and Android. It was made on August 5, 2012 by Lebanese designer Paul Salameh.https://www.wamda.com/2013/05/the-24-year-old-lebanese-entrepreneur- behind-pou-top-mobile-kids-game%C2%A0 The goal of the game is to take care of an alien who is named Pou. The player can feed, bathe, and play with Pou. There are minigames where the player can get coins. These coins can be used to buy food, clothes, and other items. It plays just like a Tamagotchi toy. == References == ==Other websites == * Pou website * Pou at Google Play Category:2012 video games Category:Android (operating system) games Category:IOS games Category:Science fiction video games Category:Virtual pet video games
